title: of section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29)(Commission for Regulation 
of Utilities)(Designation) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29)(commission regulation utilities)(designation) order 2021

title: of section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: In this Order “the Commission for Regulation of Utilities” means the
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order “the Commission for Regulation of Utilities” means the 

body established by section 8 of the Electricity Regulation Act 1999.
text_norm: 2 order commission regulation utility mean body established section 8 electricity regulation act 1999

title: of section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 3. The Commission for Regulation of Utilities is designated for the
text_raw:
3. The Commission for Regulation of Utilities is designated for the 
purposes of section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous 
Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020). 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for the 
Environment, Climate and Communications, 

29 April 2021. 

EAMON RYAN 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 18th May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [232] 3
text_norm: 3 commission regulation utility designated purpose section 29 civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (no 13 2020) given official seal minister environment climate communication 29 april 2021 eamon ryan minister environment climate communication notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 18th may 2021 232 3

title: of section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Instrument designates the Commission for Regulation of Utilities as a state 
body for the purposes of holding remote meetings under section 29 of the Civil 
Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [232]
